name: 林佑達
objective:
當代都市議題經常為跨領域、開放性的複雜問題，在資料蒐集與分析上，需要整合地理空間、時間的維度；在分析與對策上，須平衡公部門、私部門、民眾等多重利害關係者的，是一門相當複雜但重要的學問。本課程從真實的都市議題出發，教導學生掌握地理空間資訊、資料分析、資料建模、資訊視覺化、策略論述等綜合能力，培養學生對於都市複雜議題的觀察與剖析，進而對真實環境提出洞見與創意。
Contemporary urban issues are complex, requiring the integration of geographical, and temporal dimensions in data collection and analysis. Balancing the interests of stakeholders like the public, and private sectors is crucial. This course focuses on real urban issues, teaching skills in geographical information, data analysis, modeling, visualization, and strategic discourse. It aims to cultivate students' ability to observe, analyze urban issues, and propose insights for real environments. It's an advanced course, requiring basic programming and GIS concepts. Through group projects, students learn API usage, geographic computation, model building, and data visualization. The course includes one midterm report and one final project report.
schedule:
第 1 週：都市數據應用概論
第 2 週：地理空間資訊簡介與視覺化
第 3 週：時空資料庫簡介與操作
第 4 週：空間資料處理、地理運算
第 5 週：機器學習簡介與模型實作
第 6-8 週：分組實作
第 9 週：期中分組報告
第 10-12 週：模型調校
第 13-14 週：模型解讀
第 15 週：都市論述與策略建議
第 16-17 週：分組實作
第 18 週：期末分組報告

Week 1: Introduction to Urban Data Applications
Week 2: Introduction to GIS and Visualization
Week 3: Introduction to Spatiotemporal Database and ETL
Week 4: Data Processing and Geoprocessing
Week 5: Introduction to Machine Learning and Data Modeling
Weeks 6-8: Group Projects
Week 9: Midterm Group Report
Weeks 10-12: Model Calibration
Weeks 13-14: Model Interpretation
Week 15: Urban Arguments and Strategies
Weeks 16-17: Group Projects
Week 18: Final Group Report
scorePolicy:
個人課程參與 30%：
平時上課出席率、討論參與度、每週進度等綜合評比。

分組期中成果 30%：
各組期中簡報的成果總體評比，同一組每個成員評分相同。

分組期末成果 40%：
各組期中簡報的成果總體評比，同一組每個成員評分相同。

Individual Course Participation 30%:
Comprehensive assessment of regular class attendance, participation in discussions, weekly progress, etc.

Group Midterm Results 30%:
Overall evaluation of each group's midterm presentation results, with the same score given to each member within the same group.

Group Final Results 40%:
Overall evaluation of each group's final presentation results, with the same score given to each member within the same group.
